name: CrownDude
description:
Take back the crown!

local-multiplayer game that u need to "take back the crown" by anyway possible

recommend using "Parsec" program to play with ur friends online

Control

host Ctrl = X in joy button

host Alt = Y in joy button

host Space bar = A in joy button

host Shift = B in joy button

host Enter = Start in joy button

2-4 Players recommend

( dont play alone go find some friends u can do it! ;) )
